directly_addressed_dps.dp: DP3 - Adaptive Governance Supporting an Exponentially Growing Community
directly_addressed_dps.summary: Calls for an escalation protocol to handle AI-related emergencies across communities.
Proposes operational criteria like red-teaming and risk profiling for AI safety.
Suggests federated global governance tools to manage AI across jurisdictions.
Recommends tiered containment including behavioral, environmental, and structural strategies.
Advocates for secure whistleblower mechanisms to boost system integrity.
Recommends mandatory embedded metadata and tamper-evident signing for AI outputs.
Acknowledges participatory governance structures that promote responsiveness.

clarifications_and_extensions.dp: DP11 â€“ Safe and Ethical AI
clarifications_and_extensions.title: Safety Criteria and Risk Profiling for AI
clarifications_and_extensions.extension: Include thresholds for red-teaming, behavioral profiling, and transparency audits with a focus on protecting vulnerable populations.
clarifications_and_extensions.why_it_matters: Ensures that safety mechanisms are proactive, not reactive, especially for at-risk groups.

clarifications_and_extensions.title: Global Federated Governance
clarifications_and_extensions.extension: Implement cross-jurisdictional frameworks for norm-setting and emergency coordination around AI.
clarifications_and_extensions.why_it_matters: Prevents centralized domination and supports distributed oversight.

clarifications_and_extensions.title: Tiered AI Containment Architecture
clarifications_and_extensions.extension: Adopt behavioral, environmental, and structural containment methods.
clarifications_and_extensions.why_it_matters: Limits emergent risks while maintaining inter-operability and research progress.

clarifications_and_extensions.title: Secure Whistleblower Infrastructure
clarifications_and_extensions.extension: Create anonymous reporting and risk flagging tools for AI interactions.
clarifications_and_extensions.why_it_matters: Improves internal trust and allows early identification of systemic vulnerabilities.

clarifications_and_extensions.title: Mandatory Provenance Embedding
clarifications_and_extensions.extension: All AI-generated outputs must include metadata signatures and tamper-evident indicators.
clarifications_and_extensions.why_it_matters: Supports traceability in high-risk or contested environments.

clarifications_and_extensions.title: Cross-Community AI Escalation Protocol
clarifications_and_extensions.extension: Create shared systems for urgent coordination in response to AI-related incidents.
clarifications_and_extensions.why_it_matters: Allows timely mitigation of emergent threats with global scope.
